title: Calculate your armed forces redundancy benefits

details.description: Get a forecast of what you'll be entitled to as a member of the armed forces leaving service as part of a redundancy programme
details.more_information:
The calculator covers both of the armed forces redundancy schemes - AFRS 05 (2006) and AFRS 75 (2010).

If you’re not sure which scheme you’re part of, check the ‘help station’ notes within the calculator.

You’ll also need:

  • pay details from your pay statement
  • details of your armed forces pension scheme
  • your date of enlistment
  • the number of days you’ve had in detention, and any breaks in service (these don’t count as reckonable service for pension benefits)
  • your total reckonable service

There’s a separate redundancy calculator for Gurkhas on the APFS 05 and AFPS 75 schemes.
details.introduction: Use the armed forces redundancy calculator to get a forecast of your benefits if you’re leaving the service as part of a redundancy programme.
